name: JIRA tickets
description: Parse a description for JIRA ticket references in plain text (experiment descriptions)
content:
Welcome to RegExr v2.0 by gskinner.com!

Edit the Expression & Text to see matches. Roll over matches or the expression for details. Undo mistakes with cmd-z. Save & Share expressions with friends or the Community. A full Reference & Help is available in the Library, or watch the video Tutorial.

Sample text for testing:
abcdefghijklmnopqrstuvwxyz ABCDEFGHIJKLMNOPQRSTUVWXYZ
0123456789 +-.,!@#$%^&*();\/|<>"'
12345 -98.7 3.141 .6180 9,000 +42
555.123.4567	+1-(800)-555-2468
foo@demo.net	bar.ba@test.co.uk
www.demo.com	http://foo.co.uk/
http://regexr.com/foo.html?q=bar


(GROW-2844) Product agnostic tips for waiting page
(WAT-242) Measure JSD video engagement
(WAT-223) Software-Try
(WAT-240)BB Rebrand (WAC + BB) Redesign
(WAT-236) JIRA link in Agile header
(WAT-221) JSD Tour + Pricing
(GROW-2675) Improved product bundles for cross-sell v2 (w/ pricing & less products)
(WAT-173) PUR-823 (revised) Diary Study screener expand scope
(WAT-238) Crucible Headline
(WAT-239) FishEye Headline
author: shreyas
